Instruction: Pour the vodka and creme over some ice cubes in a tall glass and fill up with juice. to make it beuty full make the top of the glass with a grenadine and sugar
Stirring gently, pour all ingredients into highball glass. Garnish.
Mix one third of Prosecco, one third of Aperol and one third of Sparkling Water, add ice.
Pour the gin and the tonic water into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lime wedge.
Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and double strain into large cocktail glass. Garnish with lime wheel.
Ingridients: Vodka, Triple Sec, Lemon Juice, Cranberry Juice

Instruction: Build all ingredients in a Collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.
Garnish all the elements with Lemon Wedge inside the Glass starting from Ice Cubes
Ingridients: Gin, Tequila, Vodka, White Rum, Lemon Juice, Cola

Instruction: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with orange slice.
Ingridients: Vodka, Peach schnapps, Oranges juiced, Cranberry juice, Glacé cherries to garnish

Instruction: Add the gin, Campari and sweet vermouth to a mixing glass filled with ice, and stir until well-chilled. Add Ice. Garnish with an orange peel.
Ingridients: Campari, Gin, sweet vermouth, organze peel

Instruction: Pour the Campari and vermouth over ice into glass, add a splash of soda water and garnish with half orange slice.
Ingridients: Campari, Sweet Vermouth, Soda water, orange twist to garnish.

Instruction: Pour vodka and lime juice into a mug; add ice cubes and ginger beer. Stir to combine. Drop a lime wedge into the mug for garnish.

Rub the rim of the glass with the lime slice to make the salt stick to it. Take care to moisten only the outer rim and sprinkle the salt on it. The salt should present to the lips of the imbiber and never mix into the cocktail. Shake the other ingredients with ice, then carefully pour into the glass.
Ingridients: Cazadores Tequila, triple sec liqueur, part lime juice, lime wedge, Salt, Cubed ice

Instruction: Muddle mint leaves with sugar and lime juice. Add a splash of soda water and fill the glass with cracked ice. Pour the rum and top with soda water. Garnish and serve with straw.
Ingridients: Fresh mint leaves, lime, white sugar, ice cubes, fluid ounces white rum, club soda

Instruction: Cool a small glass with 3 ice cubes. Squeeze a lemon and strain the juice. Pour in the gin, triple sec, lemon juice and blue curacao and shake.
Ingridients: Gin, Triple sec, Blue Curaçao, Lemon Juice

Instruction: Stirred over ice, strained into a chilled glass, garnished, and served up.
Pour tequila in a shot glass, take salt and Lemon in a separate plate
Add ice cubes to shaker. Add vodka. Add peach schnapps. Add peach nectar. Shake. Strain into glass. Add lemon twist peel.
Pour the gin and the Lemon into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with the lime wedge.
Mix with crushed ice in blender until smooth. Pour into chilled glass, garnish and serve.
Ingridients: Pineapple juice, White Rum, Coconut cream, Wedge of pineapple to garnish.

Instruction: Ensure both ingredients are well chilled, then mix into the glass. Serve cold.
Ingridients: Sparkling wine, Orange Juice, Optional extras like vodka, Grand Marnier, Chambord, and whiskey.

Instruction: Pour Vodka and Coca Cola into a Highball glass
Fill shot glass with Tequila. Add drops of Tobasco sauce.
Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.
Ingridients: Baileys Irish Cream, Kahlua, Vodka, Amaretto, Cream
